mapper.select: SELECT EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_OPT_NUM AS reservOptNum /* 예약 옵션 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_ROOM_NUM AS reservRoomNum /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.PARTNER_OPT_ORDER_NUM AS partnerOptOrderNum /* 제휴사 옵션 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.PARTNER_OPT_CD AS partnerOptCd /* 제휴사 옵션 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_NM AS optNm /* 옵션 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_AMT AS optAmt /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_QTY AS optQty /* 옵션 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.DIST_OPT_CD AS distOptCd /* 직영/숙박 옵션 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT /* 예약 객실 옵션 */ WHERE 1=1 AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_OPT_NUM = #{reservOptNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 옵션 번호, NUMBER(0,22), EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT_PK(P),SYS_C0011657(C) */

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT /* 예약 객실 옵션 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_OPT_NUM = #{reservOptNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 옵션 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.PARTNER_OPT_ORDER_NUM = #{partnerOptOrderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 옵션 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.PARTNER_OPT_CD = #{partnerOptCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 옵션 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_NM = #{optNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 옵션 명, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_AMT = #{optAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_QTY = #{optQty, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.DIST_OPT_CD = #{distOptCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 직영/숙박 옵션 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS ROW__NUM, RECORDS.* FROM ( /* SQL Body Start */ SELECT EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_OPT_NUM AS reservOptNum /* 예약 옵션 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_ROOM_NUM AS reservRoomNum /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.PARTNER_OPT_ORDER_NUM AS partnerOptOrderNum /* 제휴사 옵션 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.PARTNER_OPT_CD AS partnerOptCd /* 제휴사 옵션 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_NM AS optNm /* 옵션 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_AMT AS optAmt /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_QTY AS optQty /* 옵션 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.REG_ID AS regId /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.REG_DT AS regDt /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.MODI_ID AS modiId /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.MODI_DT AS modiDt /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.DIST_OPT_CD AS distOptCd /* 직영/숙박 옵션 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ FROM EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT /* 예약 객실 옵션 */ WHERE 1=1
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_OPT_NUM = #{reservOptNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 옵션 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.PARTNER_OPT_ORDER_NUM = #{partnerOptOrderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 옵션 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.PARTNER_OPT_CD = #{partnerOptCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 옵션 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_NM = #{optNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 옵션 명, VARCHAR2(100) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_AMT = #{optAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.OPT_QTY = #{optQty, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.REG_ID = #{regId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.REG_DT = #{regDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 등록 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */
AND EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.DIST_OPT_CD = #{distOptCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 직영/숙박 옵션 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */
ORDER BY EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT.RESERV_OPT_NUM DESC /* SQL Body End */ ) RECORDS WHERE ROWNUM <= ((#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC})+1) ) WHERE ROW__NUM > (#{pageNum, jdbcType=NUMERIC}-1)*#{pageCount, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: UPDATE EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT SET /* 예약 객실 옵션 */ RESERV_ROOM_NUM = #{reservRoomNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 객실 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,PARTNER_OPT_ORDER_NUM = #{partnerOptOrderNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 옵션 주문 번호, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,PARTNER_OPT_CD = #{partnerOptCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 제휴사 옵션 코드, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,OPT_NM = #{optNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 옵션 명, VARCHAR2(100) */ ,OPT_AMT = #{optAmt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 금액, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,OPT_QTY = #{optQty, jdbcType=NUMERIC} /* 옵션 수량, NUMBER(0,22) */ ,MODI_ID = #{modiId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정자 ID, VARCHAR2(20) */ ,MODI_DT = #{modiDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR} /* 수정 일시, VARCHAR2(14) */ ,DIST_OPT_CD = #{distOptCd, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 직영/숙박 옵션 코드, NUMBER(0,22) */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_OPT_NUM = #{reservOptNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 옵션 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM EZC_RESERV_ROOM_OPT /* 예약 객실 옵션 */ WHERE 1=1 AND RESERV_OPT_NUM = #{reservOptNum, jdbcType=DECIMAL} /* 예약 옵션 번호, NUMBER(0,22) */
